languages.text: {n}Замявшись, Данрок мямлит:{/n} "В масштабах протектората эта астрономическая сумма, конечно, все равно кажется ничтожной и недостойной упоминания... Но сам факт столь наглой эксплуатации вашего расположения не может не возмущать меня!"

{n}Surprised by the question, Danrok vacillates before saying,{/n} "On a protectorate-wide scale, the astronomical sum she has extorted from us seems negligible and not worthy of notice... Nevertheless, I cannot help but be outraged by her blatant exploitation of your goodwill!"
languages.original_text: {n}Замявшись, Данрок мямлит:{/n} "В масштабах протектората эта астрономическая сумма, конечно, все равно кажется ничтожной и недостойной упоминания... Но сам факт столь наглой эксплуатации вашего расположения не может не возмущать меня!"

traits.speaker: HighFactotum

traits.speaker: HighFactotum

traits.locale_text: {n}Surprised by the question, Danrok vacillates before saying,{/n} "On a protectorate-wide scale, the astronomical sum she has extorted from us seems negligible and not worthy of notice... Nevertheless, I cannot help but be outraged by her blatant exploitation of your goodwill!"
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: {n}这个问题似乎让丹罗克很意外，他犹豫片刻才回答道。{/n}“尽管她从我们这里勒索的财物是个天文数字，但若是以整个王朝的标准来衡量，这个数字似乎微不足道，不值一提……但即便如此，她也是在无耻地利用您的善意，我无法不感到义愤填膺！”
languages.original_text: {n}Surprised by the question, Danrok vacillates before saying,{/n} "On a protectorate-wide scale, the astronomical sum she has extorted from us seems negligible and not worthy of notice... Nevertheless, I cannot help but be outraged by her blatant exploitation of your goodwill!"

traits.locale_text: {n}这个问题似乎让丹罗克很意外，他犹豫片刻才回答道。{/n}“尽管她从我们这里勒索的财物是个天文数字，但若是以整个王朝的标准来衡量，这个数字似乎微不足道，不值一提……但即便如此，她也是在无耻地利用您的善意，我无法不感到义愤填膺！”
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: {n}その質問に驚いたダンロックは、迷いながらも答えた。{/n}「保護領全体から見れば、彼女が我々から搾取した金額は極僅かであり、些細なものであるかもしれませんが…それでも、あなた様の好意をあからさまに利用するその行いには、憤りを禁じえないものであります！」
languages.original_text: {n}Surprised by the question, Danrok vacillates before saying,{/n} "On a protectorate-wide scale, the astronomical sum she has extorted from us seems negligible and not worthy of notice... Nevertheless, I cannot help but be outraged by her blatant exploitation of your goodwill!"

traits.locale_text: {n}その質問に驚いたダンロックは、迷いながらも答えた。{/n}「保護領全体から見れば、彼女が我々から搾取した金額は極僅かであり、些細なものであるかもしれませんが…それでも、あなた様の好意をあからさまに利用するその行いには、憤りを禁じえないものであります！」
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: {n}Sorprendido por la pregunta, Danrok vacila antes de responder:{/n} «En comparación con la economía del protectorado, la exorbitante suma que nos ha extorsionado parece insignificante, indigna de su atención... ¡pero sigue siendo un ultraje que explote así su buena voluntad!».
languages.original_text: {n}Surprised by the question, Danrok vacillates before saying,{/n} "On a protectorate-wide scale, the astronomical sum she has extorted from us seems negligible and not worthy of notice... Nevertheless, I cannot help but be outraged by her blatant exploitation of your goodwill!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Sorprendido por la pregunta, Danrok vacila antes de responder:{/n} «En comparación con la economía del protectorado, la exorbitante suma que nos ha extorsionado parece insignificante, indigna de su atención... ¡pero sigue siendo un ultraje que explote así su buena voluntad!».
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: {n}Surpris par la question, Danrok hésite avant de répondre :{/n} « À l'échelle du protectorat, la somme astronomique qu'elle nous a extorquée peut paraître infime et ne pas mériter notre attention... Néanmoins, je ne peux pas m'empêcher d'être scandalisé par cette exploitation flagrante de votre bienveillance ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Surprised by the question, Danrok vacillates before saying,{/n} "On a protectorate-wide scale, the astronomical sum she has extorted from us seems negligible and not worthy of notice... Nevertheless, I cannot help but be outraged by her blatant exploitation of your goodwill!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Surpris par la question, Danrok hésite avant de répondre :{/n} « À l'échelle du protectorat, la somme astronomique qu'elle nous a extorquée peut paraître infime et ne pas mériter notre attention... Néanmoins, je ne peux pas m'empêcher d'être scandalisé par cette exploitation flagrante de votre bienveillance ! »
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: {n}Danrok ist überrascht von der Frage und überlegt kurz, bevor er antwortet:{/n} "Aufs ganze Protektorat bezogen erscheint die gewaltige Summe, die sie dadurch erpresst hat, eher vernachlässigbar und keine Beachtung wert ... Und trotzdem, ich empöre mich darüber, dass sie Euer Wohlwollen so schamlos ausnutzt!"
languages.original_text: {n}Surprised by the question, Danrok vacillates before saying,{/n} "On a protectorate-wide scale, the astronomical sum she has extorted from us seems negligible and not worthy of notice... Nevertheless, I cannot help but be outraged by her blatant exploitation of your goodwill!"

traits.locale_text: {n}"Danrok ist überrascht von der Frage und überlegt kurz, bevor er antwortet:{/n} "Aufs ganze Protektorat bezogen erscheint die gewaltige Summe, die sie dadurch erpresst hat, eher vernachlässigbar und keine Beachtung wert ... Und trotzdem, ich empöre mich darüber, dass sie Euer Wohlwollen so schamlos ausnutzt!"
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: {n}Soru karşısında afallayan Danrok, tereddütle yanıtlıyor.{/n} "Protektora ölçeğinde düşünürsek bizden gasbettiği astronomik meblağ, göz ardı edilebilecek ölçüde önemsiz görülebilir... Ancak iyi niyetinizi böylesine açıkça suistimal edişi karşısında öfkelenmeden edemiyorum!"
languages.original_text: {n}Surprised by the question, Danrok vacillates before saying,{/n} "On a protectorate-wide scale, the astronomical sum she has extorted from us seems negligible and not worthy of notice... Nevertheless, I cannot help but be outraged by her blatant exploitation of your goodwill!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Soru karşısında afallayan Danrok, yanıt vermeden önce tereddüt ediyor.{/n} "Protektora ölçeğinde düşünürsek, bizden gasp ettiği astronomik meblağ, göz ardı edilebilecek ölçüde önemsiz görülebilir... Ancak iyi niyetinizi böylesine açıkça suistimal edişi karşısında öfkelenmeden edemiyorum!"
traits.speaker: HighFactotum
